item.title: Road to masters
item.description: Application Polytechnic University of the Philippines (pup.edu.ph) Open University System Entrance Examination Apply via PUP iApply for PUPOUSEE Print Payment voucher Pay Exam Fee - Landbank Branch > The teller will provide Cash Deposit Slip copy > Keep with Applicant’s copy of printed voucher Get Letter of Recommendation Submit requirements Wait 7-10 Business days for validation Exam Study re: Bucket List also: MoC - Master in Information Technology

item.title: Submit requirements
item.description: Submit requirements PUP iApply Payment Voucher ✅ 2022-12-01 2. Official Receipt or validated Landbank deposit Slip ✅ 2022-12-01 3. Letter of intent addressed to OUS Executive Director, Dr.
